tool_description: Calculates damage and loss rates for shipments, analyzing patterns and financial impact across carriers and shipping methods.

shipment_data_id.description: Reference ID for previously retrieved shipping data

incident_reports.description: Sources of damage and loss incident reports

error_messages: Invalid shipment data ID: The provided data reference cannot be found or has expired.
Incident reports unavailable: One or more incident report sources cannot be accessed.
Invalid damage category: Supported categories include packaging_damage, product_damage, loss, delay_damage, theft.
Insufficient incident data: Not enough incident reports available for meaningful loss rate calculation.
usage: Provide shipment_data_id and incident_reports sources. Optionally include claim_data and specify damage_categories for detailed analysis.

damage_rates.description: Damage rates by carrier and category (percentage)

financial_impact.description: Total financial impact of damages and losses

risk_factors.description: Identified risk factors contributing to damage and loss
